query: core_product_name: hand gloves | feature_or_specifications: voltage: 11000 v and 6600 v, test: box test in accordance with iec(international electrotechnical commission) 61482-1-2, atpv(arc thermal performance value) test in accordance with iec(international electrotechnical commission) 61482-1-1, din(deutsches institut für normung) en 388, din(deutsches institut für normung) en 407, direct incident energy (class 2): 423 kj / m2, extended direct incident energy (eio) (class 2): 1050 ... 1390 kj / m2, atpv(arc thermal performance value): 32.8 cal / cm2
